entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
